name: searchRecipes
description: Search through hundreds of thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking. NOTE: This method combines searching by query, by ingredients, and by nutrients into one endpoint.

cuisine.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes. One or more, comma separated (will be interpreted as 'OR'). See a full list of supported cuisines.

excludeCuisine.description: The cuisine(s) the recipes must not match. One or more, comma separated (will be interpreted as 'AND'). See a full list of supported cuisines.

diet.description: The diet for which the recipes must be suitable. See a full list of supported diets.

intolerances.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All recipes returned must not contain ingredients that are not suitable for people with the intolerances entered. See a full list of supported intolerances.

equipment.description: The equipment required. Multiple values will be interpreted as 'or'. For example, value could be "blender, frying pan, bowl".

includeIngredients.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that should/must be used in the recipes.

excludeIngredients.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients or ingredient types that the recipes must not contain.

type.description: The type of recipe. See a full list of supported meal types.

instructionsRequired.description: Whether the recipes must have instructions.

fillIngredients.description: Add information about the ingredients and whether they are used or missing in relation to the query.

addRecipeInformation.description: If set to true, you get more information about the recipes returned.

addRecipeNutrition.description: If set to true, you get nutritional information about each recipes returned.

author.description: The username of the recipe author.

tags.description: The tags (can be diets, meal types, cuisines, or intolerances) that the recipe must have.

recipeBoxId.description: The id of the recipe box to which the search should be limited to.

titleMatch.description: Enter text that must be found in the title of the recipes.

maxReadyTime.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

ignorePantry.description: Whether to ignore typical pantry items, such as water, salt, flour, etc.

sort.description: The strategy to sort recipes by. See a full list of supported sorting options.

sortDirection.description: The direction in which to sort. Must be either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending).

minCarbs.description: The minimum amount of carbohydrates in grams the recipe must have.

maxCarbs.description: The maximum amount of carbohydrates in grams the recipe can have.

minProtein.description: The minimum amount of protein in grams the recipe must have.

maxProtein.description: The maximum amount of protein in grams the recipe can have.

minCalories.description: The minimum amount of calories the recipe must have.

maxCalories.description: The maximum amount of calories the recipe can have.

minFat.description: The minimum amount of fat in grams the recipe must have.

maxFat.description: The maximum amount of fat in grams the recipe can have.

minAlcohol.description: The minimum amount of alcohol in grams the recipe must have.

maxAlcohol.description: The maximum amount of alcohol in grams the recipe can have.

minCaffeine.description: The minimum amount of caffeine in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxCaffeine.description: The maximum amount of caffeine in milligrams the recipe can have.

minCopper.description: The minimum amount of copper in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxCopper.description: The maximum amount of copper in milligrams the recipe can have.

minCalcium.description: The minimum amount of calcium in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxCalcium.description: The maximum amount of calcium in milligrams the recipe can have.

minCholine.description: The minimum amount of choline in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxCholine.description: The maximum amount of choline in milligrams the recipe can have.

minCholesterol.description: The minimum amount of cholesterol in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxCholesterol.description: The maximum amount of cholesterol in milligrams the recipe can have.

minFluoride.description: The minimum amount of fluoride in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxFluoride.description: The maximum amount of fluoride in milligrams the recipe can have.

minSaturatedFat.description: The minimum amount of saturated fat in grams the recipe must have.

maxSaturatedFat.description: The maximum amount of saturated fat in grams the recipe can have.

minVitaminA.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin A in IU the recipe must have.

maxVitaminA.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin A in IU the recipe can have.

minVitaminC.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin C milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminC.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin C in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminD.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin D in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxVitaminD.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin D in micrograms the recipe can have.

minVitaminE.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin E in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminE.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin E in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminK.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin K in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxVitaminK.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin K in micrograms the recipe can have.

minVitaminB1.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B1 in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB1.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B1 in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminB2.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB2.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B2 in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminB5.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B5 in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB5.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B5 in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminB3.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB3.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B3 in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminB6.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB6.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B6 in milligrams the recipe can have.

minVitaminB12.description: The minimum amount of Vitamin B12 in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxVitaminB12.description: The maximum amount of Vitamin B12 in micrograms the recipe can have.

minFiber.description: The minimum amount of fiber in grams the recipe must have.

maxFiber.description: The maximum amount of fiber in grams the recipe can have.

minFolate.description: The minimum amount of folate in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxFolate.description: The maximum amount of folate in micrograms the recipe can have.

minFolicAcid.description: The minimum amount of folic acid in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxFolicAcid.description: The maximum amount of folic acid in micrograms the recipe can have.

minIodine.description: The minimum amount of iodine in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxIodine.description: The maximum amount of iodine in micrograms the recipe can have.

minIron.description: The minimum amount of iron in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxIron.description: The maximum amount of iron in milligrams the recipe can have.

minMagnesium.description: The minimum amount of magnesium in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxMagnesium.description: The maximum amount of magnesium in milligrams the recipe can have.

minManganese.description: The minimum amount of manganese in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxManganese.description: The maximum amount of manganese in milligrams the recipe can have.

minPhosphorus.description: The minimum amount of phosphorus in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxPhosphorus.description: The maximum amount of phosphorus in milligrams the recipe can have.

minPotassium.description: The minimum amount of potassium in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxPotassium.description: The maximum amount of potassium in milligrams the recipe can have.

minSelenium.description: The minimum amount of selenium in micrograms the recipe must have.

maxSelenium.description: The maximum amount of selenium in micrograms the recipe can have.

minSodium.description: The minimum amount of sodium in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxSodium.description: The maximum amount of sodium in milligrams the recipe can have.

minSugar.description: The minimum amount of sugar in grams the recipe must have.

maxSugar.description: The maximum amount of sugar in grams the recipe can have.

minZinc.description: The minimum amount of zinc in milligrams the recipe must have.

maxZinc.description: The maximum amount of zinc in milligrams the recipe can have.

offset.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 900).

number.description: The maximum number of items to return (between 1 and 100). Defaults to 10.

limitLicense.description: Whether the recipes should have an open license that allows display with proper attribution.
